description: Phase 1: Song pages & performance voting UI (frontend for /songs/[slug] and show pages wired to vote endpoints)
Activity Feed Pagination & Badge Polish
Phase 2: Follow system UI + lists CRUD (claim/unfollow buttons, followers/following pages, create/edit lists)
Tags UI: create/edit tags, display badges, filter shows/performances by tag
Attendance: mark shows attended, show on profiles, basic stats
Venue pages: /venues index + /venues/[slug] detail with shows/stats
Updates flow: admin changelog form, ensure seed in CI/local bootstrap
Settings polish: adopt shared typings, clean duplication, add tests around security/OAuth/data flows
Performance comparisons: UI scaffold for side-by-side comparison
Community Synopsis (Wiki)
Help needed with failing tests in api/tests/test_settings.py
Fix dummy seed data not persisting in testing
Ignore caches/db in git and add scripts to regenerate
Add test app factory to avoid global FastAPI metadata collisions
Pre-commit/CI check to block cached data/db files and run focused tests
Follow/task logging hygiene: note touched files and use todo locks for big tasks
Cache/seed isolation: generate caches to .cache/ and keep git clean
List Following & Privacy
Attendance Heatmap
Codebase Optimization: Data Integrity & Production Readiness
Codebase Optimization: CORS Configuration
Codebase Optimization: Centralized API Client
QUICK WIN: Add search box to header with song/artist autocomplete
QUICK WIN: CSV export of favorite performances and voting history
QUICK WIN: Toast notifications for user actions (vote, follow, add to list)
QUICK WIN: Keyboard shortcuts documentation and implementation (?, j/k navigation)
QUICK WIN: Help documentation page with FAQ and getting started guide
QUICK WIN: Footer with links (About, Privacy, GitHub, Contact)
QUICK WIN: Dark mode toggle in settings with system preference detection
QUICK WIN: Add quick filters to show list (by year, decade, venue type)
QUICK WIN: Mobile-responsive navigation improvements (hamburger menu for small screens)
QUICK WIN: Improve performance badge styling and animations across app
CORE: Full-text search implementation for songs/artists (frontend + API integration)
CORE: Advanced filtering UI (date range, venue, decade, attendance, tags)
CORE: User profile enrichment (stats dashboard with voting patterns, favorite songs/venues)
CORE: Playlist/collection creation UI (create, edit, share public/private playlists)
CORE: Social sharing buttons (Twitter, Facebook, copy link with vote info)
CORE: Personalized recommendations (songs/performances based on user votes and follows)
CORE: Performance reviews/comments system (add text reviews, moderation flags)
CORE: Data import from external APIs (Spotify, Setlist.fm, MusicBrainz)
CORE: JSON/XML export of voting data and user collections
CORE: Mobile responsive polish (touch-friendly buttons, readable fonts, viewport optimization)
CORE: Performance optimization (lazy loading images, code splitting, caching strategy)
CORE: User content moderation tools (flag inappropriate content, admin dashboard)
CORE: Achievement badges system (milestones: 10 votes, 100 votes, first follow, etc)
CORE: Trend analysis visualization (voting trends over time, emerging songs)
CORE: Related songs recommendations sidebar (songs by same artist, similar genres, same tour)
CORE: Leaderboard system (top voters, most voted performances, trending this week)
CORE: Watch list feature (save performances to watch later, notifications for updates)
CORE: User activity timeline (show user's voting history, follows, and reviews)
CORE: Rate limiting and API key system for external integrations
STRATEGIC: Mobile app (React Native) with offline support and push notifications
STRATEGIC: Collaborative voting sessions (real-time multiplayer voting, voting parties)
STRATEGIC: Concert discovery engine (from votes, suggest concerts user might attend)
STRATEGIC: Audio fingerprinting integration (identify songs from audio, connect performances)
STRATEGIC: ML-powered recommendations (collaborative filtering, content-based recommendations)
STRATEGIC: Multi-language support (i18n, translations for major languages)
STRATEGIC: Offline support (ServiceWorker, local caching, sync when online)
STRATEGIC: Advanced analytics dashboard (heatmaps, cohort analysis, user segments)
STRATEGIC: Community moderation system (moderator roles, abuse reporting, content policies)
STRATEGIC: Live voting events (real-time voting sessions, leaderboards, announcements)
